response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am confident it will be a valuable asset to you. I am offering this product to you for $950,000, which I believe is a fair and competitive price considering its worth to you. This offer is exclusive to you and is an opportunity not to be missed. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
